messages.title: My contract with the people of Penistone and Stocksbridge
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for our community. I will make sure your voice is heard both locally and at Westminster. I will be a strong voice for our area. I will be open and honest about all expenses incurred in representing you. I will not do any paid lobbying.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fairer Britain... Nick Clegg's Liberal Democrats will:
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect front-line NHS services, put more police on patrol, give our Armed Forces fair pay, take 3.6m people out of tax, clean up politics, balance Britain's books

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Four steps to a fairer Britain
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket, a fair chance for every child, a fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener, a fair deal for you: remove unfair advantages and privileges from the political system.

issues.economy: A Liberal Democrat Treasury Team has publicly called a halt to plans to axe thousands of jobs. Our tax plans would mean no one paid any Income Tax on the first £10,000 of their earnings, putting £700 back in your pocket.
issues.education: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Pay on the first £10,000 you earn – cuts most people’s tax bills by £700. A fair chance for every child. Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.
issues.environment: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener. Invest in public transport, renewable energy and home insulation.
issues.governance: A fair deal for you: remove the advantages and privileges from the politician system. Make politicians accountable and you the right to sack corrupt MPs. We will make the House of Lords fully elected.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ian was born and bred in West Yorkshire just outside the constituency, living and working in the area for many years.

politicalExperience.achievements: He knows the value of town and parish councils to their local communities. As a councillor, he worked closely with the Parish Councils in his wards for the benefit of residents and he is sensitive to various national Park Forums, from inner-city Harare in Zimbabwe to mass communication.

quotes.text: Mr Clegg's idealism... resonates with many people.
